src:
Fulla lager problem för e-handlaren inför börsnoteringen
Sedan Marcus Lindqvist kom in som vd på Qliro Group för tre år sedan har hela bolaget knådats om. Nu ska företagets delas i tre delar.  ”Synergierna bolagen emellan är rätt små”, säger Marcus Lindqvist.
03 Nov 2019, 16:09 by Cathrine Hofbauer

text:
Full stock problems for the e-retailer prior to the IPO
Since Marcus Lindqvist joined the Qliro Group three years ago, the entire company has been renamed. Now the company will be divided into three parts. “The synergies between companies are quite small,” says Marcus Lindqvist.
03 Nov 2019, 16:09 by Cathrine Hofbauer
